在 IsoSpark™ 平台上推出 Meteor™ 芯片：推进免提定量蛋白质组学我们很高兴在 IsoSpark™ 平台上推出 Meteor™ 芯片。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Introducing-Meteore284a2-chips-on-the-IsoSparke284a2-platform-advancing-handsfree-quantitative-proteomics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Introducing-Meteore284a2-chips-on-the-IsoSparke284a2-platform-advancing-handsfree-quantitative-proteomics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c99d426-bbe3-4eef-a8cc-f0dfdd6a5bcb Mon, 18 Sep 2023 09:59:00 -0400 Introducing Meteor™ chips on the IsoSpark™ platform: Advancing handsfree quantitative proteomics
Meridian Bioscience 宣布 FDA 批准创新的 Curian® 志贺毒素检测Meridian Bioscience, Inc. 是全球领先的诊断测试解决方案和生命科学原材料供应商。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Meridian-Bioscience-announces-FDA-clearance-for-innovative-Curianc2ae-Shiga-Toxin-Assay.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Meridian-Bioscience-announces-FDA-clearance-for-innovative-Curianc2ae-Shiga-Toxin-Assay.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b3abd82-7d83-4193-8ac1-bd5691ac31ad Mon, 18 Sep 2023 09:51:00 -0400 Meridian Bioscience announces FDA clearance for innovative Curian® Shiga Toxin Assay
Meridian Bioscience 继续扩展幽门螺杆菌诊断检测解决方案，FDA 批准了首要的 HpSA flex Meridian Bioscience, Inc. 是全球领先的诊断测试解决方案和生命科学原材料供应商。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Meridian-Bioscience-continues-expansion-of-H-pylori-diagnostic-testing-solutions-with-FDA-clearance-of-premier-HpSA-flex。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Meridian-Bioscience-continues-expansion-of-H-pylori-diagnostic-testing-solutions-with-FDA-clearance-of-premier-HpSA-flex。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61a4b6a8-4a2a-4153-8a5e-840ecdbeffa Mon, 18 Sep 2023 09:46:00 -0400 Meridian Bioscience continues expansion of H. pylori diagnostic testing solutions with FDA clearance of premier HpSA flex
Broken String Biosciences 完成 1500 万美元 A 轮融资Broken String Biosciences 今天宣布已完成 1500 万美元的 A 轮投资。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Broken-String-Biosciences-closes-2415M-series-A-funding-round.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Broken-String-Biosciences-closes-2415M-series-A-funding-round.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e42bdff-ee16-423f-a836-0b170265c562 Mon, 18 Sep 2023 09:34:00 -0400 Broken String Biosciences closes $15M series A funding round
炎症和体重在抑郁症的起源中有多重要？ BMC Medicine 上的一篇新论文探讨了炎症和体重指数 (BMI) 在难治性抑郁症病因学中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/How-important-is-inflammation-and-body-weight-in-the-origin-of-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/How-important-is-inflammation-and-body-weight-in-the-origin-of-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43cab20b-5250-4da1-87dd-b71cec364609 Mon, 18 Sep 2023 08:39:00 -0400 How important is inflammation and body weight in the origin of depression?
大脑类器官的单细胞筛查以识别自闭症的发育缺陷研究人员开发了 CRISPR-人类类器官-单细胞 RNA 测序系统来识别自闭症的大脑发育缺陷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Single-cell-screening-of-cerebral-organoids-to-identify-developmental-defects-in-autism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Single-cell-screening-of-cerebral-organoids-to-identify-developmental-defects-in-autism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e1a0c2c-d565-42ac-8acb-ac5fbd6096c3 Mon, 18 Sep 2023 08:21:00 -0400 Single-cell screening of cerebral organoids to identify developmental defects in autism
利用视网膜图像检测眼部疾病的人工智能模型研究人员提出了 RETFound，这是一种基于蒙版自动编码器的自监督学习视网膜图像基础模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/AI-model-for-detecting-eye-disease-using-retinal-images.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/AI-model-for-detecting-eye-disease-using-retinal-images.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6ff26b6-6b45-49e6-85fd-0d4f72a2aacf Mon, 18 Sep 2023 08:14:00 -0400 AI model for detecting ocular disease using retinal images
无线分子电通信用于肿瘤细胞诱导的细胞凋亡研究人员利用生物纳米天线上无线诱导的氧化还原相互作用产生的电力来引起癌细胞凋亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Wireless-molecular-electrical-communications-for-tumor-cell-induced-apoptosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Wireless-molecular-electrical-communications-for-tumor-cell-induced-apoptosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e3e2b02-5bf6-4fc1-9d0d-6e3a044ba2b1 Mon, 18 Sep 2023 07:51:00 -0400 Wireless molecular-electrical communications for tumor-cell-induced apoptosis
物理治疗有助于降低头晕引起的伤害风险有症状的头晕和前庭疾病以及随后跌倒和其他伤害的风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Physical-therapy-can-help-reduce-risk-of-dizziness-induced-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Physical-therapy-can-help-reduce-risk-of-dizziness-induced-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30f027fc-3e3e-4b25-a644-abefbf4dea6d Mon, 18 Sep 2023 07:44:00 -0400 Physical therapy can help reduce risk of dizziness-induced injury
华大智造与新加坡国家癌症中心合作对亚洲流行癌症进行全面基因组分析MGI Tech Singapore Pte, Ltd.（“MGI”）是一家致力于构建引领生命科学的核心工具和技术的公司，最近与新加坡国家癌症中心（“NCCS”）建立了研究合作伙伴关系，以促进全面、多维的基因组研究使用华大智造的核心 DNBSEQ™ 技术对亚洲流行的癌症进行分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/MGI-Partners-with-National-Cancer-Centre-Singapore-to-Undergo-Compressive-Genomic-Profiling-of-Asian-Prevalent-Cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/MGI-Partners-with-National-Cancer-Centre-Singapore-to-Undergo-Compressive-Genomic-Profiling-of-Asian-Prevalent-Cancers.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68aebb7a-9e23-46b9-9784-1739e93c3172 Mon, 18 Sep 2023 06:50:00 -0400 MGI Partners with National Cancer Centre Singapore to Undergo Comprehensive Genomic Profiling of Asian-Prevalent Cancers
